item.title: Watch: Wife pushes man into River Krishna on pretext of selfie; video goes viral
item.description:
<![CDATA[Watch: Wife pushes man into River Krishna on pretext of selfie; video goes viral
A man named Tatappa alleged that his wife pushed him into the River Krishna while taking a selfie at Kadlur in Raichur district. Locals rescued him, and a video of the incident has gone viral. Police inquiry is awaited.
By Telangana Today Updated On - 12 July 2025, 02:27 PM
Mahabubnagar: In yet another frightening incident, a wife allegedly pushed her husband into River Krishna in the guise of taking a selfie on ...]]>
item.author: Telangana Today

item.title: Karnataka Woman Tries To 'Kill' Husband By Pushing Him Into Krishna River On Pretext Of Taking Selfie In Raichur (VIDEO)
item.description:
<![CDATA[Locals Rescuing Tatappa | X/@TeluguScribe
Raichur: A shocking incident has come to light from Karnataka's Raichur district. A woman allegedly tried to kill her husband by pushing him into the Krishna River on Saturday. Fortunately, the husband, who managed to swim, got stuck near a rock. Locals promptly rescued him with the help of a rope after hearing his screams, according to Telangana Today.
At a bridge over the river in Raichur, the wife had asked her husband to take a selfie. While taking...]]>
item.author: Shashank Nair
